name: NetSuite Invoice - VersaPay Invoice
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: updated_object
code.title: New/updated Invoice
code.description: New or updated Invoice in NetSuite

block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Upsert NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay Invoice

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Upsert NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay Invoice

flow_id.name: Callable - Upsert NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay Invoice

properties.label: Ignore NetSuite Payment Internal ID
properties.name: ignore_ns_payment_internal_id
properties.hint: Ignore this payment if creating payments for a new invoice (to prevent infinite loops of a payment creating an invoice which recreates the payment...)

properties.label: Ignore NetSuite Credit Memo Internal ID
properties.name: ignore_ns_credit_memo_internal_id
properties.hint: Ignore this credit memo if creating payments for a new invoice (to prevent infinite loops of a credit memo creating an invoice which recreates the credit memo...)

block.comment: Only send invoices that have a Subsidiary Internal ID of 1 (Rapid7 LLC) or 10 (Rapid7 International)
